result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Fred Alfred Peak

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Fred Alfred Peak not in court.  Haley Jo Rea appeared with intern Alyssa Hahn for the State of Wisconsin.  Court enters judgement on bail/bond.  Minutes filed.
Notice of Bail/Bond Forfeiture and Hearing - No forwarding address
Notice of Bail/Bond Forfeiture and Forfeiture Hearing

Attorney Rebecca Hammock appeared.  Matthew R. Leusink appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Warrant to issue, court orders bond forfeited.  Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Attorney Rebecca Hammock appeared.  Daniel A. Necci appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Status conference scheduled for May 1, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Fred Alfred Peak in court with attorney Rebecca Hammock.  Tracy L. McMiller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Bond remains.  Not guilty plea entered and trial reserved.  Status conference scheduled for April 27, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Defendant Fred Alfred Peak appeared, Tracy L. McMiller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Bond remains.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 6, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Defendant Fred Alfred Peak not in court.  Valerian A Powell appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 2, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Fred Alfred Peak not in court.  Estee Elizabeth Scholtz appeared with Andrew Herrmann for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 27, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
Defendant Fred Alfred Peak appeared, Tracy L. McMiller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minutes filed.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for February 27, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Signed bond filed with the court.
Plaintiff's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.  Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.

Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol.  Defendant shall not drive a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.
Defendant in court in custody with attorney Rebecca Hammock for bond purposes only. Valerian Powell appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Minutes filed.
